mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "userId", a.user_name AS "userName", a.name AS "name", a.address AS "address", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.experience AS "experience", a.amount AS "amount", a.area AS "area", a.status AS "status", a.customer AS "customer", a.quantity AS "quantity", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
